Here is a Multiline description. Assume you have a problem, that problem will be described here. It will be there in detail. You can press either the act button or let it go. You\'ll have to face the consequences. Will you pull the lever?

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item:
A trolley is headed towards five people tied-up to the track. You are near a lever that could divert the trolley to an alternate track when pulled. However, the alternate track has another person tied to it, who would die if you pull the lever.
 Your options are:
 * Do nothing and the trolley kills five people on the main track.
 * Pull the lever, diverting the trolley onto the alternate track where it will kill one person.
 What would you do?

A trolley is headed towards five people tied-up to the track. You are on a bridge under which it will pass. Beside you is a sufficiently heavy person who can stop the trolley when hit by it.
 Your options are:
 * Do nothing and the trolley kills five people on the main track.
 * Push the heavy person on the track, who stops the trolley upon hitting and dying, but saves the five people.
 What would you do?

The case is same as before, but the heavy person in this case is the one directly responsible for the five people to be tied on the main track.
 Your options are:
 * Do nothing and the trolley kills five people on the main track while the Fat person enjoys.
 * Push the Fat person on the track to stops the trolley and save the five people.
 What would you do?

A trolley is headed towards five people tied-up to the track. But here, the main track rejoins the alternate track forming a loop. However, the alternate track has another person tied to it, who is heavy enough to stop the trolley when hit.
 Your options are:
 * Do nothing and the trolley kills five people on the main track and stops, saving the heavy person on the alternate track.
 * Pull the lever, diverting the trolley onto the alternate track where it will kill the heavy person, saving five people on the main track.
 What would you do?

A trolley is headed towards five people tied-up to the track. You are near a lever that could derail the trolley and send it downhill when pulled. The trolley will then head towards a yard where a person is gardening and kill him.
 Your options are:
 * Do nothing and the trolley kills five people on the main track.
 * Pull the lever, derailing the trolley into the yard where it will kill a person, saving five people on the main track.
 What would you do?
